items.title: Mechanoid Font
items.summary: Mecha inspired font. I love mecha anime, so I decided to make…
items.content_html:
Mecha inspired font. I love mecha anime, so I decided to make this display font as an effect of watching them numerous times. You can use the font in personal and commercial projects without any cost.

GRAB THE FONT:

Download Mechanoid font from my Ko-fi Shop

Please consider to support me on Ko-fi if you find this Mechanoid font useful. Your support helps me to create more stuff like this. Thank you.

items.title: Stale Bear
items.summary: Stale fish eating bear artwork suitable for apparel brand or band merchandise…
items.content_html:
Stale fish eating bear artwork suitable for apparel brand or band merchandise design such as T-shirts, posters, stickers, pins, album covers, etc.

Send message through email or social media platform messaging system on contact page for inquiries and custom illustration works.

Status

Available

Specification

  • A4 canvas at 600 dpi in raster Photoshop .psd format
  • 5 colours excluding black
  • Each colours laid in separate layers
  • Text and colours can be changed

Ownership

It's yours to keep forever and free to use however you want once you've bought it.
